quotables.title: Quotable: 'Christ Lives for Us!'
quotables.author: John Calvin
quotables.teaser: What is Jesus doing right now? Living for us.
quotables.quote: What sort of pledge, and how great is this love towards us? Christ lives for us, not for Himself!
quotables.content: This is Calvin on Hebrews 7:25 - 'For He is able to save to the uttermost those who draw...'

quotables.title: Something about Books

quotables.teaser: Of the making of books there is no end
quotables.quote: You would know the quote is the content
quotables.content: 2 This is Calvin on Hebrews 7:25 - 'For He is able to save to the uttermost those who draw...'
